description: 3 prints: - .1 - bald, gray bearded man kneeling and painting; paints and brushes around him;  .2 - bald man with glasses seated @ low bench; he is working on wood cutting; other wood cutting tools on bench;  .3 - dark haired man seated on cushions @ low desk; artist is pressing stone onto tablet to make impression (?); [see X2013.50.1 and X2013.50 2] (3 images mounted beside each other)
title: "Maler, Holzschneider und Drucker in Japan"
